src:
Šampionski duh Ljulja i Rudija pokosio Zvezdu
Real se spasao u Beogradu i prekinuo seriju poraza na gostujućim terenima, crveno-beli ispustili veliku šansu da uzmu još jedan skalp bivšem evropskom prvaku - 75:60
07 Nov 2019 by Nikola Stojković
Crvena zvezda je poražena i ima zbog čega da žali! Kada ste deo evropske košarkaške elite svaka pobeda je suvo zlato, ali Zvezda je svoje zlatnike bacila u blato i ukaljala ih. Imali su crveno-beli kraljevsku glavu na panju, ali ponovo nisu imali dovoljno snage i smelosti da posao dokrajče i tako verovatno potpuno okrenu sezonu u pozitivnom smeru. Ovako, ostaju gorka pilula koju će ekipa vođena Andrijom Gavrilovićem morati da proguta i nova lekcija iz čistog preživljavanja u gladijatorskoj areni! Real je bio na ivici provalije, ali je na kraju ipak slavio rezultatom 75:60 (12:9, 21:18, 16:25, 26:8), čime je prekinuo seriju od tri uzastopna poraza u gostima.
Crvena zvezda je svoju šansu propustila na prelazu između treće i četvrte deonice, kada jednostavno nije znala da iskoristi strahovit zamajac posle simultanke Bilija Berona, te trojki Boriše Simanića i Mohameda Fajea za veliki preokret i prvo vođstvo (52:49) crveno-belih još od završnice prve četvrtine. Kao slamka spasa došla je kratkoročna pauza košarkašima Reala i udahnula im život koja ih je vratila na pravi kolosek. 
Sve je pošlo naopako kada je Zvezdina odbrana na trenutak spustila gard i dopustila lukavim protivnicima da iskoriste svaki milimetar slobodnog prostora da zatrpaju koš. Počelo je trojkom Rudija Fernandeza za novo izjednačenje (52:52), nastavilo hicem Fabijena Kozera posle tri ofanzivna skoka nezaustavljivog Valtera Tavaresa iz kojih je spremio tri dodatna napada svojim saigračima, da bi se brutalni niz trojki završio pogocima Serhija Ljulja i onda ponovo Rudija! Real je za ravno pet minuta minus od tri poena serijom 12:2 okrenuo na 61:52, gde je Zvezda praktično ceo taj vremenski interval ostala bez ikakvog napadačkog rešenja i srljala je iz greške u grešku.



Iz pogrešne odluke u pogrešnu odluku i potpuno odsustvo napadačkog smisla i timske košarke u oba smera. Istina, teško da bi večeras bilo ko zaustavio Real kada se ovako raspuca, pa čak ni mnogo kvalitetnije odbrane na evropskom kontinentu. Crvena zvezda je imala Real koji se “nudio“, a na kraju je domaćin završio na tanjiru tako što je oberučke dozvolio protivniku da pokupi brejk i velika dva boda za vraćanje poljuljanog samopouzdanja.
Ako je posle vezanih poena Berona i Brauna za 56:61 na četiri i po minuta pre isteka vremena izgledalo da bi Zvezda mogla da se vrati, onda su Rudi i Ljulj ubrzo pokazali zašto s punim pravom nose zvanje šampiona sveta. Gotovo rutinski još jednom su pokosili Zvezdinu odbrambenu koncepciju i Kraljevskom klubu doneli ubedljivu pobedu! Čak i ubedljiviju nego što je to igra na oba dela terena pokazala...
Crvena zvezda je ponovo odigrala loše prvu i poslednju četvrtinu, u kojim je zbirno upisala tek 17, a dozvolila 38 poena! Odbrana je u ključnim momentima bila nepostojeća, iako je na momente bila skoro granitna. Rešenja nije bilo za školske akcije u režiji Realovih plejmejkera sa džinom Tavaresom, dok su Ljulj i Rudi dali pobedi taj posebni, španski košarkaški šmek. 
Beogradski klub je ponovo izgubio dah kada se utakmica lomila, iako je svoju šansu mogla da iskoristi s pola gasa. Bili Beron je odigrao sjajnu treću četvrtinu i vezao devet poena koji je trebalo da najavi tesnu borbu za pobedu, Lorenzo Braun je ponovo imao svojih dobrih momenata u obe faze, ali je izostala reakcija kompletnog tima u defanzivnom delu, što je Zvezdu na kraju skupo koštalo...
Braun je meč završio s 14 poena, šest skokova i pet asistencija, dok je Beron imao 17 poena i po četiri uhvaćene i podeljene lopte. Kod Reala Ljulj je ubacio 16 poena uz pet asistencija, dok je Rudi imao 12 poena. Tavares je skupio 11 poena, devet skokova i čak pet blokada!
Zvezdu do sledećeg petka čekaju još dve utakmice kod kuće - prvo s Igokeom, onda i sa Asvelom... Do tada moraće da se izvuku velike pouke...
CRVENA ZVEZDA - REAL MADRID 60:75/9:12, 18:21, 25:16, 8:26/
Beogradska arenaGledalaca: 16.457

text:
The championship spirit of Ljulj and Rudy knocked down the Star
Real rescued in Belgrade and interrupted a series of defeats on away ground, red-whites miss a big chance to take another scalp to former European champion - 75:60
07 Nov 2019 by Nikola Stojkovic
The Red Star is defeated and there is nothing to regret! When you are part of the European basketball elite, every victory is dry gold, but the Star threw its gold coins in the mud and tarnished them. They had a red-and-white royal head on the stump, but again lacked the strength and courage to finish the job and thus probably completely turn the season in a positive direction. Thus, they remain a bitter pill that the team led by Andrew Gavrilovic will have to swallow and a new lesson in pure survival in the gladiatorial arena! Real were on the verge of a chasm, but eventually celebrated 75:60 (12: 9, 21:18, 16:25, 26: 8), ending a series of three consecutive away defeats.
The Red Star missed its chance at the turn between the third and fourth sections, when it simply did not know how to use the dreadful flywheel after Billy Beron's simultaneous play, and Borisa Simanic and Mohamed Faye's triples for the big red and white lead (52:49) first quarter finals. As a straw of salvation, a short break came for Real Madrid basketball players and breathed life into them, which put them back on track.
It all went wrong when the Star Defense lowered the guard for a moment and allowed cunning opponents to use every millimeter of free space to cover the basket. It started with a three-pointer by Rudy Fernandez for a new equalizer (52:52), followed by a shot by Fabian Kozer after three offensive rebounds by the unstoppable Walter Tavares, from which he prepared three additional attacks for his teammates, to end the brutal series of threes with Serhiy Ljulj's shots and then again to Rudy! In straight five minutes minus three points with the series 12: 2 turned to 61:52, where the Star practically all that time interval remained without any attacking solution and rushed from error to error.



From wrong decision to wrong decision and the complete absence of attacking sense and team basketball in both directions. True, hardly anyone could stop Real tonight when it bursts like this, or even much better defense on the European continent. The red star had Real on offer, and in the end the host ended up on the plate by allowing the opponent to pick up the break and a big two points to restore his confidence.
If after 56-61 tied points by Beron and Brown at four and a half minutes before the time was out, it looked like the Star could be back, then Rudy and Ljulj soon showed why they were rightly carrying the title of World Champion. Almost routinely, they once again mowed down the Star's defensive concept and brought a convincing victory to the Royal Club! Even more convincing than playing on both sides of the field showed ...
The Red Star again played poorly the first and last quarters, in which it totaled only 17 and allowed 38 points! The defense was non-existent at key moments, though at times it was almost granite. There was no solution to the school action directed by Real's playmakers with Gina Tavares, while Ljulj and Rudi won that special, Spanish basketball smack.
The Belgrade club lost their breath again when the match broke, though they could use their chance with half the throttle. Billy Beron played a great third quarter and tied nine points to announce a close battle to win, Lorenzo Brown had his good moments again in both phases, but lacked the reaction of the entire team in the defensive, which cost Star in the end ...
Brown finished the match with 14 points, six rebounds and five assists, while Beron had 17 points and four catches and a split. At Real, Ljulj scored 16 points with five assists, while Rudi had 12 points. Tavares amassed 11 points, nine rebounds and even five blocks!
The star will have two more games at home next Friday - first with Igoke, then with Aswell ... Until then, big lessons will have to be learned ...
RED STAR - REAL MADRID 60: 75/9: 12, 18:21, 25:16, 8: 26 /
Belgrade ArenaViewers: 16,457
